com.bumptech.glide.presenter
Class ThumbImagePresenter.Builder<A,B,C extends Target>

java.lang.Object
  com.bumptech.glide.presenter.ThumbImagePresenter.Builder<A,B,C>
Type Parameters:
A - The type of the model that the full ImagePresenter requires
B - The type of the model that the thumb ImagePresenter requires
Enclosing class:
ThumbImagePresenter<A,B,C extends Target>
public static class ThumbImagePresenter.Builder<A,B,C extends Target>
extends java.lang.Object

A builder for a ThumbImagePresenter. Has a few convenience methods to avoid identical calls on both the full and thumb presenter. ThumbImagePresenter.Builder#setFullPresenterBuilder, ThumbImagePresenter.Builder#setThumbPresenterBuilder, and ThumbImagePresenter.Builder#setImageView are required.
